mapper.insert: insert into t_api_invoke_log (api_log_id, siteid, sid, service_name, `path`, success_flag, ip, invoke_time, staff_id, create_time, remark) values (#{apiLogId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{siteid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{serviceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{successFlag,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{invokeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{staffId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
